title: Could we possibly get an option to report a player outside of end-game screen?
body: Recently joined a ranked lobby only to be matched up with a delightful fellow who immediately started cussing out other players and then selected a champion and summoner spell set, clearly intending to troll seeing as how he was assigned adc and chose some melee champion and ghost/cleanse. Images of chat for any rioters 1- http://postimg.org/image/8a94y9kxt/ 2- http://postimg.org/image/omj6nzz9d/ 3- http://postimg.org/image/wgjs9e729/

replies.body:
There is an option, its called submitting a ticket. Submit a ticket, submit your screenshots and let riot deal with it.

FYI - just cos I'm bored I've already submitted a ticket against this Dannnnnnnn character (People with so many n's in their name do it so they dont get banned or reported as easy I'm sure) . Banning peoples selected preferred in champ select is against riots ToS and should be punished.
